name: Object Time Reversal (Tenet) Game Mechanic - Demo Level
name_original: Object Time Reversal (Tenet) Game Mechanic - Demo Level
description:
This is an experimental demo for a game mechanic made in UE5. Shoot objects, and reverse them. The reversal has a lot of potential for puzzles, unlocking new dangerous paths in a level,  climbing buildings, shooting opponents behind their backs while facing you, etc. There are 4 levels that loop.

Tips:

1. To reverse displaced objects hold the time reverse button.

2. Reversed bullets can be destroyed, otherwise, they will be destroyed after a few seconds.

3. Picking reversed bullets will allow the objects that were displaced by said bullets to revert completely to their initial state. Otherwise, the bullets will be fired again at greater strength.

4. Last level, the cubes can only die by hitting them on the back.
